response.original_title: Why Smart People Believe Stupid Things
response.overview: "What causes Delusion? The prevailing view is that people adopt false beliefs because theyâ€™re too stupid or ignorant to grasp the truth. But just as often, the opposite is true: many delusions prey not on dim minds but on bright ones. And this has serious implications for education, society, and you personally."
